com.epoch.session

Class ExportImportSession

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.epoch.session.ExportImportSession
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AssgtConstants

    public final class ExportImportSession
extends Object
implements AssgtConstants
    Session to extract homework information into a string which can be stored externally, and vice versa.

      • debugPrint

        private static void debugPrint(Object... msg)

      • exportHWSets

        public static String exportHWSets(int[] hwIds)
                           throws NonExistentException,
                                  DBException
        Exports one or more assignment descriptions to an XML file.
        Parameters:
        hwIds - unique ID numbers of assignments to export
        Returns:
        the XML
        Throws:
        DBException - if there's a problem reading the database
        NonExistentException - if one of the HWs doesn't exist

      • importHWSets

        public static int importHWSets(String assgntXML,
                               String instructorId,
                               int courseId)
                        throws FileFormatException,
                               DBException
        Imports one or more assignments from an XML file.
        Parameters:
        assgntXML - XML describing the assignments
        instructorId - instructor importing these assignments
        courseId - course into which the assignments are being imported
        Returns:
        the number of assignments imported
        Throws:
        DBException - if there's a problem writing to the database
        FileFormatException - if a file can't be opened or read

      • cloneHWSets

        public static void cloneHWSets(int[] hwIds,
                               int newCrsId,
                               int addDays,
                               boolean makeVisible)
        Clones one or more existing assignments. Used when a course is being cloned.
        Parameters:
        hwIds - unique IDs of the assignments to be cloned
        newCrsId - ID number of the new course
        addDays - number of days to add to the due dates of the assignments
        makeVisible - true if should make the assignments visible
